NK015(ba)001:0: tshe dpag med lung lugs kyi brgyud 'debs bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)001:1: kun bzang rdor sems phyag na rdo rje dang //
NK015(ba)001:2: ku ku r+aa dza in+d+ra b+hu ti che //
NK015(ba)001:3: sing+ha u pa r+aa dza rdo rje bzhad //
NK015(ba)001:4: sangs rgyas gsang ba rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)001:5: bi ma gnyags chen lha dpal gnubs yab sras //
NK015(ba)001:6: ye shes rgya mtsho sher mchog nyang ye 'byung //
NK015(ba)001:7: zur pa mes dbon thugs sras ka chen bzhi //
NK015(ba)001:8: gsang bdag sh+aaka seng rnams la bshes gnyen jo pad sher 'od brtson 'grus seng //
NK015(ba)001:9: dar ma sed+ge bsod dpal dpal chen po //
NK015(ba)001:10: drin chen gtsug nor kun dga' rgyal mtshan dang //
NK015(ba)001:11: chos rgyal byang bzang rnams la kun rdor dpal mgon rgyal mtshan bsod rig dang //
NK015(ba)001:12: tshe dbang bkra shis dbang 'dzin klong yangs 'od /
NK015(ba)001:14: / 'gyur med rdo rje rin chen rnam par rgyal //
NK015(ba)001:15: o rgyan bstan 'dzin rdo rjer phrin las rnam rgyal phrin las chos kyi sgron //
NK015(ba)001:16: sangs rgyas kun dga' bstan 'dzin nor bu'i dpal //
NK015(ba)001:17: khyab bdag 'gyur med phan bde'i 'od zer sogs //
NK015(ba)001:18: rtsa brgyud bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)001:19: thugs rje'i bdag nyid mgon po mchog rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)001:20: tshe rabs kun tu rjes su 'dzin pa dang //
NK015(ba)001:21: tshe 'dir mchog thun dngos grub myur thob nas //
NK015(ba)001:22: rang gzhan don gnyis 'grub par byin gyis rlobs //
NK015(ba)001:23: zhes rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas kyi gsung la
NK015(ba)001:24: brgyud pa'i khyad par gyis gter chen nas bdag gi
NK015(ba)001:25: rigs bdag bla ma'i bar kha bsgyur ba po ni
